snippet: HANDLER--Mark, a man of style and substance; a raconteur and humorist. His kindness and generosity was unsurpassed. We cherished our friendship and memories will live forever. Hugs to Barb and family. Judy and Aaron 1/3...
lead_paragraph: HANDLER--Mark, a man of style and substance; a raconteur and humorist. His kindness and generosity was unsurpassed. We cherished our friendship and memories will live forever. Hugs to Barb and family. Judy and Aaron 1/3
